Description: Floor sherd of Attic pottery lamp (?); interior: splash of black glaze; three concentric ridges and central nipple; underside: flat, reserved and polished; inscription cut on underside.
Bibliographic references: Petrie 1886 / Naukratis. Part I., 1884-85 (pl. XXXIV, no. 475)
Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (KC.62) (Phase 3)
